entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy with thunderstorms this evening. Local rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light late this evening. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 13 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
